title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: STEM Education Pathway Retention via High-Structured Active Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their academic achievement with over 80% accuracy through an AI prediction model based on Learning Management System (LMS) data
Learners can establish and execute a self-directed learning plan at least twice weekly through structured active learning activities
Learners can request appropriate support within 24 hours of a problem occurring using digital learning tools (quizzes, discussion boards, AI tutors)
Learners maintain a 75% or higher intention to continue STEM career paths upon course completion
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
